titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 449: Prayer in the form of praise of the Prophet

msContents.summary: Prayer in the form of praise to the Prophet with an introduction. A concluding note mentions that al-Sayyid ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Sayyid Ḥusayn al-Dāghtānī approved of the recitation (ajāza), approval which was also granted to Ayyūb Shamʻī (f. 36v). A leaf in a different hand included at the back of the copy is a selection from the Qurʼān containing verses 9-25 from Sūrat al-Anfāl (f. [38]).

msItem.title: Prayer in the form of praise of the Prophet
[Prayer in the form of praise of the Prophet.]

supportDesc.extent: ii, 38, ii leaves : 172x 120 (157 x 77) mm, bound to 172 x 120 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed, vocalized.

decoNote: Rubrications in red; textblock border-ruled in black, gold, and red; gold roundels with red and blue points.

binding.p: Reddish brown leather over pasteboard with flap; gold painted central diaper grid pattern with frame of parallel lines and cornerpieces; purple paper doublure.

origin.p: The item is undated; probably 18th or 19th century.
